Entries.928202213/f Shane {{FriendshipRequiredHe: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Shane 64 18 0/pause 700/speak Shane "Hey, @. Before you head out...#$b#I hate to ask this... but can I have 5,000g as a favor?#$b#It's for a secret project I'm working on in town. I promise it's something important."/pause 1000/question fork0 "Give Shane 5,000g for his secret project?#Yes#No"/fork giveShaneMoney/playMusic none/pause 1000/emote Shane 12/speak Shane "Really? You don't trust me with the money?$a#$b#I thought I'd proven myself to you by now..."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/emote Shane 28/pause 400/speak Shane "I guess I can't blame you for not trusting me, but it still hurts.$s"/pause 800/end dialogue Shane "Look, just leave. I don't want to talk to you right now.$s"
Entries.giveShaneMoney: pause 200/addMailReceived gaveShaneMoney/money -5000/emote Shane 32/pause 500/speak Shane "Great! Swing by the Saloon on Sunday and I'll show you the end result!$h"/pause 500/end

Entries.928202214/n gaveShaneMoney/o Shane/d Mon: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 100 100 2/addWorldState saloonSportsRoom/addMailReceived saloonSportsRoom/message "It's Sunday... I should swing by the saloon later and see what Shane has been up to!"/end

Entries.928202215/e 928202214/n saloonSportsRoom: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Shane 32 7 0 Alex 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/addConversationTopic ShaneSportsRoom 7/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "Big play!"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Shane "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 400/speak Shane "Hey, @! You made it!$h"/faceDirection Shane 1/speak Shane "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Shane "I've been thinking... You know how I used to play gridball in high school?#$b#I thought the part of me that loved gridball was long gone, destroyed by the booze.$s#$b#But now that I'm sober, I've started talking to some of the guys here again.$h#$b#And I thought it would be good to have a place where we could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room.#$b#You and this town changed my life, and I wanted to give back something."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Shane 1/speak Shane "Thanks, George."/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm happy to get out of the house and socialize with people again.$h"/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 100/speak Alex "How come I never knew you used to play?$h"/pause 1200/speak Gus "I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Though maybe not so good for George's heart...$s"/pause 100/faceDirection George 2 true/emote George 16/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Now see here!"/pause 500/emote Shane 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition."/pause 1000/message "5,000g well spent!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Shane "Thanks again for the money, @. It really meant a lot to me, and all the guys seem happy with it!"

What did you think?$h"/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "I've been really into this game lately...#$b#I can't help but play round after round..."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/animate Shane false true 100 34/pause 500/speak Shane "I've even reached the number three spot in the global leaderboards... you might say I'm one of the best.$h"/pause 500/stopAnimation Shane/pause 100/move Marnie 0 -1 1/speak Marnie "You've been here so long though and staying up so late at night...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 200/emote Shane 8/speak Shane "Yeah, I've been having trouble sleeping because of the Joja Cola... Yeah, yeah, I know... It's not good. But it helps me focus..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 200/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection Shane 2/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Shane "Wait... did it look like I was drinking beer?$10"/faceDirection Marnie 2/emote Marnie 28/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "@? You know I wouldn't go back on my word.$10"/question fork0 "#We were worried...#I just wanted to know what was going on"/fork wewereworried/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/emote Shane 40/speak Shane "...That's alright, @. You're just looking out for me. I get it.#$b#Look... I know I haven't been perfect... but, I'm trying my best... and I'm gonna keep trying. So you don't have to worry about me.#$b#My life is better now than it's ever been. I'm not in such a dark place anymore..."/pause 500/emote Marnie 20 true/emote farmer 20 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "You know, when I'm playing this game, I become so focused that I can't think about anything else. It really helps when I've got the urge..."/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "But I'm in control. I might lose track of time, but I won't lose myself. Don't worry.#$b#I'll just play one more round and head home. Okay?"/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Shane "You guys must have been really confused when you came in and saw me in front of the arcade machine!$h"
